entity.name: gene_annotations
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT 'annotation' AS document_category, g.id || c.id || gene_annotation.reference_id || gene_annotation.assigned_by || gene_annotation.evidence_cls AS id, g.id AS bioentity_id, g.symbol AS bioentity_label, g.type_cls AS type, gene_annotation.with_expression, gene_annotation.reference_id AS reference, gene_annotation.assigned_by AS source, gene_annotation.last_update_date AS date, g.taxon_cls AS taxon, gene_annotation.cls AS annotation_class, c.label AS annotation_class_label, gene_annotation.evidence_cls AS evidence_type FROM gene_annotation INNER JOIN bioentity AS g ON (gene_annotation.bioentity=g.id) INNER JOIN cls AS c ON (gene_annotation.cls=c.id)

entity.name: evidence_with
entity.query: SELECT with_info.with_xref AS annotation_with FROM with_info WHERE with_info.id='${gene_annotation.with_expression}'

entity.name: annotation_extension_class
entity.query: SELECT extension_expression.cls AS annotation_extension_class FROM extension_expression WHERE id='${gene_annotation.extension_expression}'
